resources.string: We aim to create the best cryptocurrency app. We will be happy to get positive feedback on Google play. Please select rating.\nThanks for your support!
Help us make app better! If you still have a question, Feel free to message us
We are using CoinMarketCap API for the top coins list. Also we awesome CryptoCompare API service to get charts data and other features. We appreciate both of them.
Add coin transactions here to track profit/loss and portfolio distributions. See an example of a standard portfolio below.
